mapper.select:
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, ITEM_KIND, OEM_PRICE , AS_PRICE , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT FROM ITEM where 1=1
AND item_no=#{itemNo}

SELECT B.ITEM_NO , B.ITEM_NM , B.OEM_PRICE, B.AS_PRICE, 'CHK' CHECKED FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO =B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.CAR_CODE =#{carCode} UNION ALL SELECT B.ITEM_NO , B.ITEM_NM , B.OEM_PRICE , B.AS_PRICE, '' CHECKED FROM ITEM B WHERE ITEM_NO NOT IN ( SELECT B.ITEM_NO FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO =B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.CAR_CODE =#{carCode} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_RCAR_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT MON, ITEM_NO, SUM(CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_RCAR WHERE MON=#{mon} GROUP BY MON, ITEM_NO
INSERT INTO ITEM_CKD_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT MON, ITEM_NO, SUM(CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_CKD WHERE MON=#{mon} GROUP BY MON, ITEM_NO
INSERT INTO ITEM_AS_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT MON, ITEM_NO, SUM(CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_AS WHERE MON=#{mon} GROUP BY MON, ITEM_NO
mapper.select: SELECT CAR_CODE ,ITEM_KIND ,ITEM_NO ,ITEM_NM ,OEM_PRICE ,AS_PRICE ,CAR_CNT ,CKD_CNT ,RCAR_CNT ,AS_CNT ,TOTAL_CNT ,OEM_PRICE*TOTAL_CNT OEM_TOTAL_PRICE ,AS_PRICE*AS_CNT AS_TOTAL_PRICE ,(OEM_PRICE*TOTAL_CNT)+(AS_PRICE*AS_CNT) TOTAL_PRICE FROM ( SELECT T1.CAR_CODE, T2.ITEM_KIND, T2.ITEM_NO, T2.ITEM_NM ,IFNULL(T2.OEM_PRICE, 0) OEM_PRICE ,IFNULL(T2.AS_PRICE, 0) AS_PRICE ,IFNULL(T3.CAR_CNT, 0) CAR_CNT ,IFNULL(T4.CKD_CNT, 0) CKD_CNT ,IFNULL(T5.RCAR_CNT, 0) RCAR_CNT ,IFNULL(T6.AS_CNT, 0) AS_CNT , IFNULL(T3.CAR_CNT, 0)+IFNULL(T4.CKD_CNT, 0)+IFNULL(T5.RCAR_CNT, 0) TOTAL_CNT FROM CAR_ITEM T1 INNER JOIN ITEM T2 ON T1.`ITEM_NO`=T2.`ITEM_NO` LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ITEM_NO, SUM(CNT) CAR_CNT FROM CAR_MON_CNT A INNER JOIN CAR_ITEM B ON A.`CAR_CODE`=B.`CAR_CODE` WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY B.ITEM_NO ) T3 ON T2.`ITEM_NO`=T3.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT CKD_CNT FROM ITEM_CKD_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T4 ON T2.`ITEM_NO`=T4.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT RCAR_CNT FROM ITEM_RCAR_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T5 ON T2.`ITEM_NO`=T5.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT AS_CNT FROM ITEM_AS_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T6 ON T2.`ITEM_NO`=T6.ITEM_NO ) TT1
